resources.string: Welcome to the quiz application about technologies! \n\n There are 10 questions about new trends in technologies. So good luck, be smart, be on trend!
It is a field of computer science that gives computer systems the ability to progressively improve performance on a specific task with data, without being explicitly programmed.
Basically it is an oriented graph, each subsequent block in which includes hash information the hash value from the previous block.
Major goals of this technology are Knowledge reasoning, Planning, Machine learning, Natural language processing, Computer vision, Robotics.

This technology is used to enhance the natural environments or situations and offer perceptually enriched experiences. With the help of advanced technologies (e.g. adding computer vision and object recognition) the information about the surrounding real world of the user becomes interactive and digitally manipulable.
It is a computer-generated scenario that simulates a realistic experience.
Big data can be described by the following characteristics: Volume, Variety, Velocity and … \n\n (Choose 2 variants)

It is the network of physical devices, vehicles, home appliances and other items embedded with electronics, software, sensors, actuators, and connectivity which enables these objects to connect and exchange data.
The year of the discovery of 3D printing technology.

…The approach, known as a generative adversarial network, or GAN, takes two neural networks-the simplified mathematical models of the human brain that underpin most modern machine-learning and pits them against each other in a digital cat-and-mouse game… \n\n It is a part of description…
Write the full name of technology IIoT.
Congratulations!\n\n You have finished this test. Your result is:
You know a lot about new technologies! Excellent result!
You have a good knowledge of new technologies. Good result!
You should read about new technologies! Try again to improve the result!
